messages.content:
To install ComfyUI-Texture-Simple, navigate to the 'custom_nodes' directory and clone the repository using the command: ```cd custom_nodes
git clone https://github.com/gokayfem/ComfyUI-Texture-Simple.git```
What is the purpose of ComfyUI-Texture-Simple?
ComfyUI-Texture-Simple is a custom node or plugin that allows users to upload any texture map and visualize it inside ComfyUI.
What is suggested to do if I want to reset the scene with ComfyUI-Texture-Simple?
If you want to reset the scene with ComfyUI-Texture-Simple, you should unconnect a texture, queue prompt, and connect the texture again, queue prompt.
What should I do if I see a black screen with ComfyUI-Texture-Simple?
If you see a black screen with ComfyUI-Texture-Simple, it is suggested to clear your browser cache.
Are there any example workflows for creating textures inside ComfyUI?

Yes, there are example workflows for creating textures inside ComfyUI, such as [SKB Workflow](https://openart.ai/workflows/RI9P1EtnxtC6SpKldOeW), [mtb nodes workflow](https://github.com/melMass/comfy_mtb/blob/main/examples/05-seamless_texture.json), and [Jags Workflow](https://openart.ai/workflows/koala_jealous_20/3d-material-texture-generator-using-sdxl-and-xy-tiling--seamless/b5B0a8OEAbypScLAC8ch).
